product_name: Cannondale Synapse Carbon 4 Compact Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: The Cannondale Synapse Carbon 4 Compact women's road bike uses an ultralight carbon frame, snappy SRAM Rival shifters and relaxed positioning for excellent performance comfort during endurance rides. Women's Synapse carbon frame promotes efficiency and comfort with an optimized tube shape; frame geometry gives a more upright position than more race-oriented road frames. Rear part of the frame and the all-carbon fork feature the Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology for damping road vibration. FSA Energy compact crankset is paired with a massively wide-ranging 11-32 tooth cassette for a gradient-nullifying gear range; BB30 bottom bracket enhances energy efficiency. SRAM Rival shifters and derailleurs supply precise, snappy shifts throughout the 20 gear combinations, all with a single lever movement. Fulcrum Racing 7 wheelset is wrapped with the fast-rolling Schwalbe Lugano tires for confident handling and speed. Pedals not included. Specs on the Cannondale Synapse Carbon 4 Compact women's road bike are subject to change.
